PrivacyPolicy:
I (Tom Knapp) take data protection seriously.
I keep to a minimum the information I hold about you.
I use your data to provide services to you, respond to your enquiries, and meet my legal obligations.
I delete your data when it is no longer needed for these things.
Generally, I do not give your information to third parties, but there are some exceptions.
You have privacy rights as an individual and I am happy to talk to you about how I process and protect your data.

- Where my apps require use of your information to work, I will store and use information you provide locally on the device or on my servers and not share that information with anyone else unless specific consent is given.
- My free applications use advertising currently provided by Admob. You will be asked to provide consent to receive adverts provided by Admob before being served any adverts. Anonymous statistical information is reported to them so they can see whether their adverts are effective. More information about Admob can be found at: admob.google.com.
- I will only disclose your personal information if I have a legal obligation to do so, or if I need to enforce an obligation against you, or if you are using an application which is designed to share that data.
- Privacy Policies relating to apps are available within the apps.
- Any changes I may make to the privacy policy in the future will be posted on this page and served to any affected apps you have installed.

If you have any questions about this policy, please contact me at enquiries@tomknapp.co.uk
